name: menubar
description: Improves multi-monitor handling of the status bar and restarts it on crashes.

commands.name: bar
commands.short_description: Start (default), restart, stop or toggle the menu bar.
commands.full_description:
[restart|stop|toggle] Start (default), restart, stop or toggle the menu bar.

Args:
    args: The action to perform
        - (empty): Start the bar
        - restart: Stop and restart the bar
        - stop: Stop the bar
        - toggle: Toggle the bar on/off

config.name: command
config.description: Command to run the bar (supports [monitor] variable)

config.name: monitors
config.description: Preferred monitors list in order of priority
